overview: Three volume 2 picks up with the three lovers Ingrid (Gia Green), David (Sylvan) and Andrea (Bunnie Bennett) as they explore their new polyamorous relationship underneath the Spanish sun. But when everything seems just too good to be true, the throuple must navigate through betrayal and jealousy, showing that defying traditional romantic relationships doesnâ€™t come without it's own challenges. When Andrea see's the intense connection between David and Ingrid how will she react? Don't miss the second instalment of Erika Lust's cinematic adult film series.
title: Three, Volume 2
